suffixes.bit: an internal category used to refer to some threats
suffixes.cl: an internal category used to refer to some threats
suffixes.dha: an internal category used to refer to some threats
suffixes.dll: Dynamic Link Library component of a malware
suffixes.based: containers characteristics usual to a particular class of malware
suffixes.gen: malware that is detected using a generic signature
suffixes.siggen: malware that is detected using a generic signature

suffixes.rfn: an internal category used to refer to some threats
